item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 05 Mar 2024
item.description:
1. mirage-crypto 0.11.3 (with more speed for elliptic curves) -- and the future roadmap of mirage-crypto
  2. Ocsigen: summary of recent releases
  3. OCaml Platform Newsletter: January 2024
  4. Discussions on the future of the opam repository
  5. ocaml-protoc-plugin 5.0.0
  6. ppx_minidebug 1.3.0: toward a logging framework
  7. iostream 0.2
  8. Bogue, the OCaml GUI
  9. Owl project restructured
  10. 20+ ways to build an executable with foreign libs
  11. opam build and opam test: the opam plugins that simplifies your dev setup
  12. Seeking feedback on repackaged libraries for Base
  13. Outreachy internship demo session
  14. dream-html 3.0.0
  15. Add your OCaml Events to the Community Page on OCaml.org
  16. Other OCaml News
